sentences.en: ‘What do you wear when you go out?’ ‘Well, it varies.’
sentences.cn: “你出门的时候通常穿什么衣服？”“噢，得看情况。"

sentences.en: As opinions vary on that point, no decision can be reached.
sentences.cn: 在那一点上, 大家意见纷纷,莫衷一是.

sentences.en: Charges vary according to size.
sentences.cn: 费用因大小而异。

sentences.en: Cooking times may vary slightly, depending on your oven.
sentences.cn: 烹饪时间可能略有不同，因烤炉而异。

sentences.en: Medical treatment varies greatly from state to state.
sentences.cn: 医疗制度州与州之间差异很大。

sentences.en: Monthly interest costs vary.
sentences.cn: 每个月的利息费用都不一样。

sentences.en: My doctor said I should vary my diet more.
sentences.cn: 医生说我应该使日常饮食更加多样化。

sentences.en: Other services vary dramatically in quality.
sentences.cn: 其他服务在质量上差别很大。

sentences.en: Parental attitudes vary widely.
sentences.cn: 家长态度千差万别。

sentences.en: Prices may vary so it's well worth shopping around before you buy.
sentences.cn: 价格可能会有高有低，所以在买之前很有必要货比三家。

sentences.en: Prices vary according to the quantity ordered.
sentences.cn: 价格随订购数量不同而有所变化。

sentences.en: Prices vary from one shop to another.
sentences.cn: 各家商店价格不同。

sentences.en: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.cn: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

sentences.en: Rooms vary in size and come equipped with hairdriers, television and telephone.
sentences.cn: 房间大小不同,均配有吹风机 、 电视和电话.

sentences.en: She has tried different diets with varying degrees of success.
sentences.cn: 她试过各种不同的节食方式，效果各不相同。

sentences.en: Test scores vary from school to school.
sentences.cn: 测验成绩各校不同。

sentences.en: tests of varying levels of difficulty
sentences.cn: 难易程度不一的测验

sentences.en: The heights of the plants vary from 8 cm to 20 cm.
sentences.cn: 这些植物的高度从8厘米到20厘米不等。

sentences.en: The importance of being an Olympian will vary from athlete to athlete.
sentences.cn: 参加奥运会对每个运动员而言意义不同。

sentences.en: The island's hotels vary wildly.
sentences.cn: 岛上的宾馆千差万别。

sentences.en: The levels of tolerable pain vary greatly from individual to individual.
sentences.cn: 对疼痛的耐受程度因人而异，差别很大。

sentences.en: The treatment regime may vary widely depending on the type of injury.
sentences.cn: 因受伤类型不同治疗方法可能有很大的区别。

sentences.en: This absolutist belief is replaced by an appreciation that rules can vary.
sentences.cn: 这种绝对主义的信念被规则可以变通这一认识所替代。

sentences.en: To complicate matters further, everybody's vitamin requirements vary.
sentences.cn: 更麻烦的是，每个人对维生素的需求量是不同的。

sentences.en: You are welcome to vary the diet.
sentences.cn: 我们鼓励不时变换饮食。

words.tran_cn: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
可变性，变化性；[生物][数] 变异性
[数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 在……方面变化；在……方面有差异

trans.tran_en: if something varies, it changes depending on the situation
if something varies, it changes depending on the situation
if something varies, it changes depending on the situation
if something varies, it changes depending on the situation
